unsolved: Optimal (automated) distribution of user interface elements
use_cases_desc:
- Multi-device document reader (distributed PDF reader)
- Video player (video streaming application)
evaluation: Study with developers; Quality measurements (interview with developers); Quantitative measurements (optimizer performance)
contribution_desc: Panelrama. a web-based framework to build distributed user interfaces. Developers can specify affinity values for each panel and characteristics for each device, which will be used to calculate the optimal distribution of panels across available devices. Panelrama uses integer programming-a linear optimization function-to determine optimal scores for each panel and device and then automatically distributes the panels according to the optimal scores.
use_cases: Not bound to a specific use case, but the paper demonstrated knowledge work (multi-device reader) and a video streaming application
